name: ChargeStorm AB
goal: Chargestorm is on a mission to create the best charging station solutions for electrical vehicles on the market. Our business is to ensure success for companies providing electrical vehicles charging services by providing complete charging infrastructure solutions, from small to large installations.
interests: Climate Action, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives: Vi följer förslag och beslut kring eMobility, elbil satsningar och laddinfrastruktur.
